reviews.review: Perhaps a sign that Marvel is fixing it's mistakes and learning from the past. Part one ties in all its characters and plot devices nicely and builds to a spectacular climax. If Infinity War is to drop the ball, it won't be because of part 1
The tone of the film felt consistent and they did a great job fitting in all the heroes. Great action sequences and many emotional moments
An exceptional film a decade in the making and one that I believe will go down as one of the epics of this century.
Tops any marvel movie yet. Isn't cliche nor do things happen in ways you think are going to happen it keeps you on your toes the whole time.
F. Awesome.. I cant wait to see the second part
This is the best movie in my life the graphism are amazing i hope the avengers 4 will be better
I loved this movie, however it's the Empire strikes back for the Avengers' universe.

For those not initiated into the cult of Marvel this movie may seem like too much with little weight carried but for those that have followed through all the adventures over the last 10 years this movie will hold the weight of a collapsing star. This movie will be remembered as this generation's empire strikes back

The wait has been so long, but too many movies have made this feel like every other Marvel film, only thing different is that the villain was actually good!!! A total CGI fest like Avengers and age of ultron, except with more CGI super hero's.

Drama, action, comedy & imminent danger; Visual FX & CGI are beautiful; it has great landscapes that put you in the movie; photography is pretty good; camera in hand is also immersive & gets you into conflict; it has a lot of humor, more that Marvel's previous ones (except Thor Ragnarok), also, this humor is too good, you laugh all the time with the interactions of the characters & it's set to relax from the tension & drama; the film handles the emotional aspect well in moments, i didn't feel anything in others, since they want to make you cry by repeating the same situations from previous movies in MCU; Doctor Strange has a lot of power, as well as Thor; Thor & Rocket Raccoon have good chemistry; Thanos is the best villain of MCU, terrifying & imposing, main protagonist; best film since The Winter Soldier; the Black Order is good, although inconsistent, have great powers & fight well, but when they face someone with low level, it turns out that they win them for the convenience of the script, terrible & meaningless; it feels like a 5-hour movie, but split into 2; waiting the next year for the second part.
